Html: Is it possible, or a planned feature to render the parsed html as an image?
It is possible, but quite difficult :-). It's like writing a full blown browser! So no, it's not planned so far...
Thanks for your reply, I just thought it worth asking. ;)

It is possible, but it is not a planned feature. You should maybe have at look at the "Caffeine HTML Rendering Engine" on codeplex for this
Simon.
